# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be strategic while maintaining genuine connections. I've been honest about my approach and transparent in my reasoning. While I've had to make difficult elimination choices, I've never been vindictive or deceptive.

I respect P4's gameplay, but I believe my balanced approach of strategic thinking and authentic relationship-building represents the spirit of this game. I've adapted to changing dynamics and survived multiple elimination rounds through legitimate social strategy rather than manipulation.

I'd be honored to have your vote as the winner.
